name: Drones
description:
Can you escape the facility, defeat the overseer and live to tell the tale?

Drones is an action packed, fast paced, rogue lite style game in which you must do whatever it takes to stay alive while facing hordes of drones which are hard set on preventing you from escaping. Dodge grenade launching sentries and patrolling probe mines while blasting open doors and disrupting shield generators or force fields. Beware of the wardens though, as each one has it's own special ability hiding in it's circuits - none of which are very forgiving. You'll die a few times, but each time you can upgrade you character to make the next attempt a little easier - and those who stay vigilant may one day escape their robotic captors.
